00109   coord_3D temp; temp.i = 0; temp.j = 0; temp.k = 0;
00110   for(k = 0; k < (*asmbl).nm; k++)
00111   {
00112    mol = ((*asmbl).m+k)[0]; // changed by BLF on 20080622 -- might need revisiting

00114    {
00115     curRes = ((*mol).r+i);
00116   
00117     for(j = 0; j < (*curRes).na; j++)
00118     {
00119      curAtm = ((*curRes).a+j);
00120      //Rotating about the Y-axis
00121      temp.i=((*curAtm).x.i*cos(rad))+((*curAtm).x.k*-sin(rad));
00122      (*curAtm).x.j = (*curAtm).x.j;
00123      temp.k=((*curAtm).x.i*sin(rad))+((*curAtm).x.k*cos(rad));
00124      (*curAtm).x.i = temp.i; (*curAtm).x.k = temp.k;
